div.label: Sakizaya
div.div: u hata un Sri Lanka （斯里蘭卡）

td.p: SLS 693 - National flag of Sri Lanka

a.i: Flags of the World - Sri Lanka (see >>From "Specifications for the National Flag of Sri Lanka"<<)

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr; border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

div.i: This work is in the public domain in Sri Lanka (details). This is because the work falls in one of the following categories defined in the Sri Lanka's Intellectual Property Act, No. 36 of 2003:

li.i: Perpetual copyright. Permission to make any work derived from folklore must be sought from the Minister in charge of the subject of Culture. This right is claimed worldwide. Works falling in this category are considered unfree on Commons and are not allowed.

li.b: Official text of a legislative, administrative or legal nature:

li.i: 70 years from the date on which the work was first published, or, if unpublished, 70 years from the making of the work.
70 years from the date on which the work was first published.
25 years from the date of the making of the work.
70 years after death of author, or in the case of works of joint authorship, 70 years after the death of the last surviving author.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa;

tr.td: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

span.span: The source code of this SVG is valid.
This flag was created with an unknown SVG tool

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color: #fdf4d8; border: 2px solid #DAA520

tr.td:
This is one of the images forming part of the Valued image set: Flags of SAARC member countries on Wikimedia Commons. The image set has been assessed under the valued image set criteria and is considered the most valued set on Commons within the scope:
Flags of SAARC member countries
You can see its nomination at Commons:Valued image candidates/Flags of SAARC member countries.

div.div:
Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time. (newest | oldest) View (newer 10 | older 10) (10 | 20 | 50 | 100 | 250 | 500)
Date/TimeThumbnailDimensionsUserComment
current14:40, 29 December 20201,200 × 600 (25 KB)FDRMRZUSA (talk | contribs)Fixed proportions and positions for elements, according to related sourced construction sheets: [http://www.vexilla-mundi.com/sri_lanka_flag.html] (Vexilla Mundi) and [https://www.fotw.info/flags/lk.html#constr] (Flags of the World). Re-optimized svg code before upload. No other changes.
20:55, 28 December 20201,200 × 600 (24 KB)FDRMRZUSA (talk | contribs)Fixed position of the "lion" on X-axis only (Y-axis unchanged). Added viewbox. Re-optimized svg code before upload. No other changes.
18:51, 28 December 20201,200 × 600 (20 KB)FDRMRZUSA (talk | contribs)Fixed path imperfection for the "lion" (sword). Optimized svg code with code cleanup and reduction. No other changes.
16:29, 24 December 20181,200 × 600 (22 KB)Tcfc2349 (talk | contribs)fixed
01:39, 11 May 20171,200 × 600 (22 KB)Zscout370 (talk | contribs)Update on colors (uses Munsell). Page 8 of SLS 693 and used http://pteromys.melonisland.net/munsell/ to choose the values.
16:51, 15 July 20141,200 × 600 (22 KB)SiBr4 (talk | contribs)Code
21:17, 18 February 20121,200 × 600 (62 KB)Zscout370 (talk | contribs)There was an issue with the display?
17:29, 5 November 20111,200 × 600 (53 KB)Zscout370 (talk | contribs)SLS 693 - National flag of Sri Lanka specifications (kept the lion pattern, but it was not in the right sizes and position.
17:16, 5 November 20111,200 × 600 (55 KB)Uvants2 (talk | contribs)Changed the shape of the lion, as per the Constitution of Sri Lanka[http://www.priu.gov.lk/Cons/1978Constitution/Schedle_2_Amd.html]
08:45, 11 February 20101,200 × 600 (18 KB)Zscout370 (talk | contribs)Munsell colors from http://www.eonet.ne.jp/~s-inoue/CO6_henkan/index-a.html (based from the document mentioned in this file)
(newest | oldest) View (newer 10 | older 10) (10 | 20 | 50 | 100 | 250 | 500)

div.p: View more global usage of this file.

This file contains additional information such as Exif metadata which may have been added by the digital camera, scanner, or software program used to create or digitize it. If the file has been modified from its original state, some details such as the timestamp may not fully reflect those of the original file. The timestamp is only as accurate as the clock in the camera, and it may be completely wrong.
